EntryName	ODPX_HUMAN
ProteinName	Pyruvate dehydrogenase protein X component, mitochondrial (Dihydrolipoamide dehydrogenase-binding protein of pyruvate dehydrogenase complex) (E3-binding protein) (E3BP) (Lipoyl-containing pyruvate dehydrogenase complex component X) (proX)
GeneName	PDHX PDX1
Length	486
Function	Required for anchoring dihydrolipoamide dehydrogenase (E3) to the dihydrolipoamide transacetylase (E2) core of the pyruvate dehydrogenase complexes of eukaryotes. This specific binding is essential for a functional PDH complex.
